author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GKN Says Richard Parry-Jones Steps Down As Senior Independent Director
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Gkn Plc:
* ‍CHANGE IN BOARD RESPONSIBILITIES​ * SENIOR INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR, RICHARD PARRY-JONES INDICATED HE WISHES TO STAND DOWN FROM ROLE, WHILE REMAINING CHAIRMAN OF REMUNERATION COMMITTEE​
* ‍ANGUS COCKBURN HAS THEREFORE AGREED TO REPLACE RICHARD AS SENIOR INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
